and when the hell did advertisements get so good

verse 2 jack met adam met  ryan met

if someones shy or if they hate me

but were too shy to ever say it say it
so we pretend were all amazing
its 3 am i should be sleeping sleeping
see ajr liveget tickets as low as 10you might also likechorus adam met jack met  ryan met jack met   alba avoricani

maybe youd love em yeah maybe youd feel me
but ill never ask you no thats super scary ahahah

its too hard to tell if anythings real or not

to vote for someone to vote for someone
and you might end up with someone evil
but you say that he means well

my friendsll dip theyre over it
if i keep on talkin politics
im hamilton without the hits
